options.query:
| mstats avg("wlcInterfaces.inDiscards") prestats=true WHERE "index"="wireless" AND "wlcName"="Main" span=10s BY wlcName
| timechart avg("wlcInterfaces.inDiscards") span=10s useother=false BY wlcName WHERE max in top5
| fields - _span*
| rename * AS "* - wlcInterfaces.inDiscards"
| rename "_time - wlcInterfaces.inDiscards" AS _time
| append [
| mstats avg("wlcInterfaces.inErrors") prestats=true WHERE "index"="wireless" AND "wlcName"="Main" span=10s BY wlcName
| timechart avg("wlcInterfaces.inErrors") span=10s useother=false BY wlcName WHERE max in top5
| fields - _span*
| rename * AS "* - wlcInterfaces.inErrors"
| rename "_time - wlcInterfaces.inErrors" AS _time
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time
| append [
| mstats avg("wlcInterfaces.outDiscards") prestats=true WHERE "index"="wireless" AND "wlcName"="Main" span=10s BY wlcName
| timechart avg("wlcInterfaces.outDiscards") span=10s useother=false BY wlcName WHERE max in top5
| fields - _span*
| rename * AS "* - wlcInterfaces.outDiscards"
| rename "_time - wlcInterfaces.outDiscards" AS _time
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time
| append [
| mstats avg("wlcInterfaces.outErrors") prestats=true WHERE "index"="wireless" AND "wlcName"="Main" span=10s BY wlcName
| timechart avg("wlcInterfaces.outErrors") span=10s useother=false BY wlcName WHERE max in top5
| fields - _span*
| rename * AS "* - wlcInterfaces.outErrors"
| rename "_time - wlcInterfaces.outErrors" AS _time
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time
| append [
| mstats avg("wlcInterfaces.rx") prestats=true WHERE "index"="wireless" AND "wlcName"="Main" span=10s BY wlcName
| timechart avg("wlcInterfaces.rx") span=10s useother=false BY wlcName WHERE max in top5
| fields - _span*
| rename * AS "* - wlcInterfaces.rx"
| rename "_time - wlcInterfaces.rx" AS _time
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time
| append [
| mstats avg("wlcInterfaces.tx") prestats=true WHERE "index"="wireless" AND "wlcName"="Main" span=10s BY wlcName
| timechart avg("wlcInterfaces.tx") span=10s useother=false BY wlcName WHERE max in top5
| fields - _span*
| rename * AS "* - wlcInterfaces.tx"
| rename "_time - wlcInterfaces.tx" AS _time
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time

| mstats avg("wlcInterfaces.inDiscards") prestats=true WHERE "index"="wireless" AND "wlcName"="Keynote" span=10s BY wlcName
